sqlMap.select: select CONTRACT_NO contractNo, BILL_CYCLE yearMonth, BILL_DAY billDay, SHOULD_PAY shouldPay, FAVOUR_FEE favourFee, b.ITEM_NAME detailName, LOGIN_NO loginNo, to_char(a.OP_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') opTime from act_adjowe_info a, act_item_conf b where ID_NO = #ID_NO# AND a.acct_item_code=b.acct_item_code AND to_char(a.OP_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #BEGIN_TIME# AND #END_TIME#

select remark, login_no loginNo, op_code opCode, op_sn opSn, should_pay shouldPay, to_char(OP_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') opTime from act_adjowe_info where ID_NO = #ID_NO# and op_code in ('8010', '8041') AND to_char(OP_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #BEGIN_TIME# AND #END_TIME# order by op_time desc

SELECT decode(nvl(max(bill_day), 0) + 1, 1, 9000, max(bill_day) + 1) billDay FROM ACT_ADJOWE_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(OP_TIME,'YYYYMM') = #YEAR_MONTH# AND CONTRACT_NO = #CONTRACT_NO# AND ID_NO=#ID_NO# AND BILL_DAY >= 9000

SELECT SHOULD_PAY backFee,REMARK remark,ADJ_REASON adjReason,ADJ_TYPE adjType,ERR_SERIAL errSerial, STATUS status,OP_SN opSn,BILL_ID billId, TO_CHAR(OP_TIME,'YYYYMMDD') opTime, LOGIN_NO loginNo, ID_NO userIdNo FROM ACT_ADJOWE_INFO WHERE 1 = 1
ID_NO = #ID_NO#
OP_SN = #OP_SN#
TRIM(ADJ_FLAG) = #ADJ_FLAG#
STATUS = #STATUS#
ADJ_TYPE IN
#ADJ_TYPE[]#
LOGIN_NO = #LOGIN_NO#
TO_CHAR(OP_TIME,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #BEGIN_TIME# AND #END_TIME#
TO_CHAR(OP_TIME,'YYYYMM') =#YEAR_MONTH#
ORDER BY OP_TIME ASC

SELECT A.OP_SN OP_SN, A.ID_NO ID_NO, TO_CHAR(A.OP_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') OP_TIME, A.ADJ_REASON ADJ_REASON, A.SHOULD_PAY SHOULD_PAY, A.ADJ_TYPE ADJ_TYPE, A.LOGIN_NO LOGIN_NO, A.ERR_SERIAL ERR_SERIAL,A.GROUP_ID, B.SP_NAME SP_NAME,B.OPER_NAME OPER_NAME, B.SP_CODE SP_CODE, B.OPER_CODE OPER_CODE, B.BILL_TYPE BILL_TYPE, B.LAST_TIME USER_TIME,B.UNIT_PRICE PRICE,B.QUANTITY COUNT FROM ACT_ADJOWE_INFO A, ACT_OBBIZBACK_INFO B, BS_LOGINMSG_DICT C, BS_CHNGROUP_DICT D WHERE A.OP_SN = B.LOGIN_ACCEPT(+) AND A.LOGIN_NO = C.LOGIN_NO AND C.GROUP_ID = D.GROUP_ID AND D.REGION_ID = #REGION_ID# AND C.PROVINCE_ID = #PROVINCE_ID# AND A.GROUP_ID = D.GROUP_ID(+)
A.ID_NO = #ID_NO#
ADJ_FLAG = #ADJ_FLAG#
A.STATUS = #STATUS#
A.OP_CODE = #OP_CODE#
AND TO_CHAR(A.OP_TIME,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #BEGIN_TIME# AND #END_TIME#

select ID_NO idNo, OP_SN loginAccept, TO_CHAR(OP_TIME,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') opTime, ERR_SERIAL foreignAccept, ADJ_TYPE refundType, SHOULD_PAY refundMoney, LOGIN_NO loginNo, ADJ_REASON reasonCode from ACT_ADJOWE_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(OP_TIME, 'YYYYMM') = #YEAR_MONTH#
AND ADJ_REASON=#REASON#
AND TO_CHAR(OP_TIME,'YYYYMMDD') >= #BEGIN_TIME#
AND TO_CHAR(OP_TIME,'YYYYMMDD') <= #END_TIME#
AND CONTRACT_NO = #CONTRACT_NO#
AND OP_SN = #LOGIN_ACCEPT#

SELECT NVL(SUM(SHOULD_PAY),0) FROM ACT_ADJOWE_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND CONTRACT_NO = #CONTRACT_NO#
AND ID_NO = #ID_NO#
AND TO_CHAR(OP_TIME, 'YYYYMM') = #YEAR_MONTH#
AND SHOULD_PAY > 0

SELECT NVL(SUM(SHOULD_PAY),0) FROM ACT_ADJOWE_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND CONTRACT_NO = #CONTRACT_NO#
AND TO_CHAR(OP_TIME, 'YYYYMM') = #YEAR_MONTH#
AND SHOULD_PAY < 0
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ACT_ADJOWE_INFO SET STATUS='1' WHERE ID_NO=#ID_NO# AND OP_SN=#OP_SN#
